name: Word of Death
description: You speak the word of death, targeting a creature within a short (10 unit) distance that can hear you. If they fail a resilience check of 8, they take 15 dark damage. If a creature dies from this damage, the word echoes to any creature within a very short (5 unit) radius of the initial target, dealing 10 dark damage.
charge: The spell targets an additional creature.
